DocAttribute.Name: FilletRadius
DocAttribute.Documentation: The fillet that is equally applied to all transitions between the segments of the _IfcPolyline_, providing the geometric representation for _the Directrix_. If omited, no fillet is applied to the segments.

DocWhereRule.Name: CorrectRadii
DocWhereRule.Documentation: If a _FilletRadius is given_, it has to be greater or equal to the _Radius_ of the disk.

DocWhereRule.Name: DirectrixIsPolyline
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The _Directrix_ shall be of type _IfcIndexedPolyCurve_ with no _Segments_, or of type _IfcPolyline_.
DocWhereRule.Expression: ('IFCGEOMETRYRESOURCE.IFCPOLYLINE' IN TYPEOF(SELF\IfcSweptDiskSolid.Directrix)) OR (('IFCGEOMETRYRESOURCE.IFCINDEXEDPOLYCURVE' IN TYPEOF(SELF\IfcSweptDiskSolid.Directrix)) AND NOT(EXISTS(SELF\IfcSweptDiskSolid.Directrix.Segments)))
